definitions.definition: Displaying genius or brilliance; tending to invent.
definitions.example: This fellow is ingenious; he fixed a problem I didn't even know I had.

definitions.definition: Characterized by genius; cleverly done or contrived.
definitions.example: That is an ingenious model of the atom.

definitions.definition: Witty; original; shrewd; adroit; keen; sagacious.
definitions.example: He sent me an ingenious reply for an email.
